sentences.sContent: Although he is 11th in line to the throne, Mr Phillips does not have a royal title as his mother declined to give her children the HRH title at birth.
sentences.sContent_eng: Although he is 11th in line to the throne, Mr Phillips does not have a royal title as his mother declined to give her children the HRH title at birth.
sentences.sCn: 虽然菲利普斯在继承王位的资格上排到了第十一名，但是由于母亲在他出生时，拒绝传给他殿下的头衔，菲利普斯并没有皇室头衔。

sentences.sContent: Treacy said he was "delighted, flattered and touched by HRH Princess’ Beatrice’s decision to donate the hat to charity."
sentences.sContent_eng: Treacy said he was "delighted, flattered and touched by HRH Princess’ Beatrice’s decision to donate the hat to charity."
sentences.sCn: 崔西表示，“比特莱斯公主殿下拍卖帽子捐赠善款的决定让我很高兴、很荣幸、也很感动。”
